Contextual Minimum-Norm Estimates (CMNE): A Deep Learning Method for Source Estimation in Neuronal Networks. arXiv:1909.02636; doi: https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.1909.02636Installation^^^^^^^^^^^^To install the latest stable version of CMNE, you can use pip_ in a terminal:.. code-block:: bash pip install -U cmneUsage of the Docker Container^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^Build the docker image with.. code-block:: bash docker build -t brain-link/cmne:v0.01 .and run it with.. code-block:: bash docker run -ti -v <YOUR DATA DIR>:/workspace/data -v <YOUR CMNE RESULTS DIR>:/workspace/results -v <YOUR CMNE GIT DIR>:/workspace/cmne --name CMNE brain-link/cmne:v0.01It is convinient to install CMNE for development directly from the local repository.
